file_content.text: The data has been sent to intelligence headquarters on Coruscant.
If you have any questions about military operations on--
Wait--are you the ones who recovered the Endar Spire data?
My pardon, Jedi. I'm actually expecting one of your order. Are you the one who saved my team at the Endar Spire?
Ah, Lieutenant. I was expecting you. Excellent job at the Endar Spire.
Oh, pardon. Are you the hero of the Endar Spire?
Everything from the primary computers is on here.
I brought the data.
You're the one I'm supposed to report to?
Commander Viqui?
Yes. I appreciate the service you have done for me and for the Republic.
You should expect no less.
They should get medals for saving us and then risking themselves to bring me home.
She should get a medal for saving the lot of us, then dragging my sorry self home.
Not only did he save us all, he brought me home, against the lieutenant's advice. I owe him my life.
Then I congratulate you doubly. We have few enough able men on this planet.
The data from the Endar Spire will be invaluable to the Republic's war efforts. Lieutenant Karlsu tells me there's close surveillance footage of the Imperial warships.
My life is dedicated to stopping the spread of the Sith.
Anything to help.
As is mine.
The Force reaches out to correct its own imbalance.
We do as we are fated.
Well, whether it does or not, I'm going to keep helping it along.
Havoc Squad belongs to the Republic, sir.
I live to serve.
And the Republic is honored to have you.
It's kinda fun doing this galaxy-shaking stuff. Makes me all shivery.
I like this "hero" thing.
Wartime can stir patriotism in the most unlikely souls.
It was nothing.
Did it really take three hundred years to decide this might be useful?
Took you long enough.
Taris has been beyond our reach. That we are here now speaks well for our chances in this war.
Thank you for your service. Republic intelligence has been waiting for this data since the bombardment fell.
Please refer all operations questions to Captain Childress at the main base.
A lot of the team was hurt in the attacks. I brought the most wounded.
This man needs medical care.
The med unit tells me your technician is doing much better.
Thank you for your service, both to the Republic as a whole, and to every man in it.
